selector.name: animate()
selector.description: Runs a custom animation on the selected elements

selector.name: clearQueue()
selector.description: Removes all remaining queued functions from the selected elements

selector.name: delay()
selector.description: Sets a delay for all queued functions on the selected elements

selector.name: dequeue()
selector.description: Removes the next function from the queue, and then executes the function

selector.name: fadeTo()
selector.description: Fades in/out the selected elements to a given opacity

selector.name: fadeToggle()
selector.description: Toggles between the fadeIn() and fadeOut() methods

selector.name: finish()
selector.description: Stops, removes and completes all queued animations for the selected elements

selector.name: queue()
selector.description: Shows the queued functions on the selected elements

selector.name: slideToggle()
selector.description: Toggles between the slideUp() and slideDown() methods

selector.name: stop()
selector.description: Stops the currently running animation for the selected elements

selector.name: toggle()
selector.description: Toggles between the hide() and show() methods
